title: Is there a confirmed reset date?
body: Expected date listed as 7 Dec, but nothing has been posted or updated for a while. Also mentions its during patch 6.24.

replies.body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017

I'd say just wait until 6.24 is released, I'm sure they'll announce it with the patch notes. Patching starting within 24 hours now.
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
